text: Thank you.. you gave me that glimmer of hope earlier this year when my son had experienced multiple episodes of autistic burnout

Thanks so much Naomi. This course has helped me understand that I am seeing the symptoms of an issue with my 7 year old daughter which I need to explore further. It has also given me some great ideas that I will suggest to the school to see if it will help take the pressure off my little girl and in doing so reduce her anxiety. Thank you for sharing your experience and knowledge.
author: My Child is Not Fine At School attendee

text: This course has been eye opening. It has shown me that I must first reduce the pressure for my son, but also seek help for myself
author: Burnt Out by School? attendee

text: Thanks so much for such a great webinar! I've learnt so much
author: My Child is Not Fine At School attendee

text: So helpful and very validating of recent decisions we’ve made about secondary school for our daughter. Thank you.
author: Helping Autistic Children With School attendee

text: I found this course very informative and really empowering. It really reinforced my instincts that forcing my child into school against their will isn't the only way to help them!
author: My Child Is Not Fine At School attendee

text: Brilliant course, thank you. Has really helped me reflect on the journey to the point we are now at.
author: Burnt Out by School? attendee

text: This course has been invaluable. It seems to be describing our 15 yr old daughter exactly
author: Burnt Out by School? attendee

text: This has been so helpful. I especially appreciated the part at the end which explains how to help them with the effects of school trauma
author: After School: Helping Your Autistic Child Move On from School Trauma attendee

text: Every school should see your course, it’s amazing
author: School Trauma and Autism/PDA attendee

text: Thank you so much for the recording. It was quite an emotional watch at times, but really helpful.
author: My Child Isn't Fine At School attendee
